landingPage.faqSubtitle: Everything you need to know about our platform.

faq.q1: Can I customize the website for my academy?
faq.a1: Yes! You can fully customize colors, logos, pages, and content to match your brand identity.
faq.a2: Yes, parents receive automatic updates about schedules, payments, and attendance via SMS and email.
faq.q3: Do you support Arabic and French languages?
faq.a3: Yes, our platform supports Arabic (RTL), French, and English out of the box.
faq.q4: Can I import existing player data?
faq.a4: Yes, you can easily import player and parent data via CSV or Excel files.
